text:
@EliStokols @PressSec As if. 

And how many will die or be permanently injured from #COVID19 before *it dies out on its own* due to inaction/incompetence if not malice by #PresidentEvil?

It’s long term affects are coming to focus & its not good.

#TrumpKnewAndDidNothing
#TrumpLiesAmericansDie
